name: granular-ac
description: Granular Access Control library for managing permissions.

scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags
scripts.pre-release: npm version prerelease && git push && git push --tags

author: Ezequias Lopes <ezequiaslopesdev@gmail.com>
